title: Web Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Strengthening Mathematical Problem-Solving Skills Through Case Studies

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental mathematical concepts and procedural problem-solving skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can derive complex mathematical problem-solving strategies by analyzing success/failure case studies
Learners can construct logical counterarguments and rebuttals in similar problem situations through case-based reasoning
Learners enhance their ability to propose comprehensive solutions for various mathematical problem types
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
